text:
An unidentified gang stole 30 sovereigns of gold jewellery and Rs.3 lakh from the house of a financer in Batlagundu near here on Tuesday.

The police said the gang broke open the house of financier Raja and stole cash and jewels. Fingerprint experts were pressed in to service. Sniffer dog too was brought to the spot. The burglary took place when Raja and his family members had gone to Palani for the Thai Poosam festival. Further investigation is on.
title: Cash, jewels stolen
